mapper.insert: insert into prescriptiondetailed (id, PrescriptionId, DrugsId, Useage, Dosage, Frequency, Price) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prescriptionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drugsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update prescriptiondetailed set PrescriptionId = #{prescriptionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DrugsId = #{drugsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Useage = #{useage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, PrescriptionId, DrugsId, Useage, Dosage, Frequency, Price from prescriptiondetailed
